snippet: The killings of the two officers, who died conducting a raid on a rural building believed to be a bomb-making workshop, came amid an escalation of attacks on security forces.
abstract: Officials in Egypt say Islamist militants killed an Egyptian brigadier general and a colonel in an early-morning gun battle in the Nile Delta province of Qalyubeya; killings come amid an escalation of attacks on security forces in Egypt.
lead_paragraph: The killings of the two officers, who died conducting a raid on a rural building believed to be a bomb-making workshop, came amid an escalation of attacks on security forces.

headline.main: Two Officers Killed by Militants, Egypt Says
headline.print_headline: Two Officers Killed by Militants, Egypt Says
